title: Weapons
content: Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3 (BG3) are a piece of equipment that is used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. BG3 Weapons are usually categorized into different types that suit each playable class, each weapon possesses its own stats, bonuses, and effects. Weapons are usually obtained as rewards from completing quests, purchased from merchants, looted from various locations, or dropped by Enemies or Bosses.
